content: cuffed sleeves breezy drape and seamless construction make this the casual cardigan the easiest bang for your crochet buck the ad-free large-type pdf includes a written pattern stitch charts and helpful photos it s formatted for easy printing and viewing on the go whether you re new to garment making and want an easy wearable win or or an old pro looking for a vacation project this topper is as fun to make as it is to wear you re sure to fall in love with the unique u-shaped pockets delicate texture and slinky crochet fabric of the nexus cardi this pattern is written in 8 sizes s-5x and uses a dk weight/category 3 yarn there s plenty of positive ease creating a casual flattering look this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew size // sweater bust s - 45 5 m - 50 l - 53 5 1x - 55 2x - 58 3x - 60 5 4x - 63 5x - 65 5 see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing skill level - advanced beginner this is a great first garment pattern for sweater newbies downloading - this listing is for the habitat cardigan crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our easy free crochet cardigan patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/modern-free-crochet-cardigan-patterns/
